Title: Code Injection
Description: Arbitrary Code Execution in TYPO3 CMS.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.22, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.7.0
NotImpacted: All versions before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.22 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.7.0
